feed.title: Mutation-core: A mutation testing tool for Bitcoin Core

entry.title: Mutation-core: A mutation testing tool for Bitcoin Core
entry.summary: Corecheck appears to be a tool or project related to programming, but specific details about its functionality or purpose are not clearly understood. The mentioned GitHub repositories for Corecheck, named `mutation-worker` and `chernobyl`, are archived and no longer updated, which can imply that the project is either discontinued or paused. The URLs provided, [mutation-worker](https://github.com/corecheck/mutation-worker) and [chernobyl](https://github.com/corecheck/chernobyl/), suggest that these were once active parts of the Corecheck suite or project, potentially offering functionalities or services pertinent to its overarching goals. However, without recent updates, their current relevance or utility might be limited, indicating a possible shift in development focus or cessation of activity within the Corecheck initiative.
